subject: Hello
body:
Hello 
You are giving us uncompleted informations about your transaction 
there is no way I can submit your file to my superiors with just your name and address.
I sent a form which you are supposed to fill with your complete information, even if you dont remember them all fill the ones you can remember and we shall complete the rest for you.
Follow the instructions given to you if you really want to claim your funds.
Send back to me the form i sent to you with your information's
I am about rounding up this week so your continuous delay is not helping matters .
Yours ,faithfully
Alain Coulibaly (Office of the CEO. IRTD. ADB).

subject: Re:   Hello
body:
Hello Alain Coulibaly,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided. However, I have a few questions before I proceed with filling out the form.

1. Can you please provide more details about the funds that I am supposed to claim? How did I become eligible for this?

2. Is there any specific reason why my name and address are required on the form? What purpose does it serve?

3. Could you please explain what you mean by "rounding up this week"? What is the deadline or urgency associated with this process?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Shirley
